Interface IListOfBooks

All Known Implementing Classes:
ElementNode, EmptyNode
public interface IListOfBooks
This interface represents a basic subset of methods for a recursive list of books.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IListOfBooks
    addAtEnd(Book book)
    Return an IListOfBooks obtained by appending a specified book to the end.
    IListOfBooks
    allBefore(int year)
    Return a sublist containing the books published before the given year.
    int
    count()
    Return the number of books in this list.
    String
    toString()
    Create and return a string that can be used to print this list.
    float
    totalPrice()
    Return the sum of the prices of all books in this list.

  • Method Details

    • count

      int count()
      Return the number of books in this list.
      Returns:
      the size of this list

    • totalPrice

      float totalPrice()
      Return the sum of the prices of all books in this list.
      Returns:
      the total price of the list of books

    • allBefore

      IListOfBooks allBefore(int year)
      Return a sublist containing the books published before the given year.
      Parameters:
      year - the year before which all the returned books are published
      Returns:
      the list of all books published before the given year

    • addAtEnd

      IListOfBooks addAtEnd(Book book)
      Return an IListOfBooks obtained by appending a specified book to the end.
      Parameters:
      book - an instance of Class Book
      Returns:
      IListOfBooks the modified list
